sentences.en: A call for 100 bottles of blood was answered promptly.
sentences.cn: 征求100瓶血液的呼吁很快得到了回应.

sentences.en: Corbett leaned against the wall and promptly vomited.
sentences.cn: 科比特倚在墙边,马上呕吐了起来.

sentences.en: He paid the money back promptly.
He was promptly paid for it.
sentences.cn: 他为那事立即得到报酬.

sentences.en: If there is any difficulty, please let us know promptly.
sentences.cn: 倘有困难, 请迅速通知我们.

sentences.en: Please write me promptly on arrival.
Promptly at one, luncheon was served.
sentences.cn: 午饭一到一点钟就上桌了。

sentences.en: She appears promptly at eight each day.
She promptly seized the opportunity his absence gave her.
sentences.cn: 她立即抓住了因他不在场给她创造的机会.

sentences.en: Sister Francesca entered the chapel, took her seat, and promptly fell asleep.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西丝卡修女走进小教堂，坐下来，很快就睡着了。

sentences.en: The cells will promptly start to soak up moisture.
sentences.cn: 细胞会立即开始吸收水分。

sentences.en: The librarian had these new books promptly accessioned.
sentences.cn: 图书馆员迅速地把这些新书登记于图书目录.

sentences.en: Two-thirds of inheritors promptly sold the houses they were left.
sentences.cn: 三分之二的继承人会把他们继承得到的房产迅速变卖。

sentences.en: We presented ourselves to the authorities promptly.

words.tran_cn: 提示；付款期限；DOS命令：改变DOS系统提示符的风格
提示；促进；激起；（给演员）提白

trans.tran_cn: 敏捷地，迅速地，立即地，毫不迟疑
